jd:
Hi,
Hope you are doing great!!

please send me an updated copy of your resume and below details.

Position: Python Architect
Location: San Diego, CA
Duration: Long term

Job Description:

Mandatory Skills
- Ability to develop Enterprise and Project Performance Test strategies
- Strong Python/ Locust tool skills
- Proven ability to develop frameworks preferably performance testing frameworks
- Collaborate with Development, Product owners, solution architects, business teams
- Good understanding of Performance Testing and Engineering lifecycle, including scoping and workload modeling
- Conduct performance tests – Load, Stress, Endurance etc
- Ability to analyze test results and provide performance improvement recommendations
- Demonstrated experience with APM, preferably Datadog
- Working knowledge of distributed Cache, Load Balancers, Database systems
- Good project planning skills
- Be able to identify improvement areas and implement for delivery excellence
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Strong written and verbal communication skills
- Interest in learning new tools and technologies

Good to have skills
- Design and implement automated Performance Testing in the CI/CD pipeline.
- Experienced in setting up Production monitoring dashboards based on business and IT goals
- Experience with micros servers based on architecture and containerization-based deployments like Docker, Kubernetes
- Knowledge of application architecture concepts, including topology, protocols, components, and principles would be advantageous
- Good communication and interpersonal skills.

If you are interested in this job position mentioned please respond with your resume in MS word format with these details.
